Poco::Data

class BLOBStreamBuf

Library: Data
Package: DataCore
Header: Poco/Data/BLOBStream.h

Description

This is the streambuf class used for reading from and writing to a BLOB.

Inheritance

Direct Base Classes: UnbufferedStreamBuf

All Base Classes: Poco::UnbufferedStreamBuf
